messages.message:
So, with new approach, we can do individual table selection & filtering.
Sample queries can be like:
1. For individual table selection:
    a. Extract the transactions table from this document.
2. For filtering:
    a. Get me all the transactions where more than $50 is debited.
    b. Get me all the transactions between $10 and $1000 withdrawals for the October month and also add a new column for balance less than $100. Only select date, Description, Withdrawals and Balance columns.
For build-basic mode, just give the table name which you want. For Converse/build-reasoning, you can be descriptive like above

I will send out an update on the upcoming table extraction improvements in the 24.02 release, along with sample examples, this week.

cc: @Rakesh
